1.0.0.name: wordpress/nextend-smart-slider-lite
1.0.0.description:
Check the DEMO and the Pro Plugin's page on our site.

Smart Slider gives you the ability to create amazing slides which easily arouse visitor interest. The perfect all-in-one slider solution for Joomla and WordPress.

You’ve probably noticed that a lot of websites lately have a featured area with content that slides or changes in some way. This is a great technique to show several pieces of content in a limited amount of space and a good way to engage the user. The point of this product is to increase the efficient access to your site with a slider.

The Smart Slider with a feature-set like this will be of great value to both new users as well as seasoned expert developers, who would like to improve their own websites. With this feature-rich extension you will be able to get started simply, but also powerful enough to create customized and high-perfo
